Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~elli-androulaki In the Description, please describe how this differs from the attribute-based access control that was added to v1.1 chaincode under FAB-5346 and FAB-6089 (chaincode APIs for attribute-based attestation). Will this Epic enhance/extend the v1.1 APIs? Or a completely different set of use cases and APIs?

Action.author: elli-androulaki
Action.body: ~denyeart let me know if the added content above answers your question.
